title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(brms)
```

```{r}
d <- tribble(
  ~game_type, ~gender, ~xplain, ~games,
  "comp", "female", 7, 35,
  "comp", "male", 1, 23,
  "qp", "female", 6, 149,
  "qp", "male", 2, 132
)
```

```{r}
d <- d %>% mutate(female = ifelse(gender == "female", 1, 0))
```

```{r}
toy_s <- 
  brm(data = d, family = binomial,
      xplain | trials(games) ~ female + game_type,
      prior = c(set_prior("normal(0,10)", class = "b")),
      iter = 25000, warmup = 500, cores = 4, chains = 4)      
```

```{r}
predict(toy_s, probs = c(0.25, 0.75)) %>%
  as_tibble()
```
